In round 1, only Seeker_B has applied to us, but accepting now would use our only quota and could block a higher-priority candidate who may approach us in subsequent rounds. Given we can prefer to wait rather than lock in a lower-ranked match, it is optimal to reject now and keep the position open for higher-priority seekers. Seeker_B has strong preference for Company_A (top choice), but that benefits them more than us; our objective is maximizing our own priority match within quota.
